title: Metacognitive problem solving: Exploration of studentsâ€™ perspectives through the lens of multi-dimensional engagement
content:
Chem. Educ. Res. Pract., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4RP00096J, Paper
Kimberly Vo, Mahbub Sarkar, Paul J White, Elizabeth Yuriev
Solving chemical problems entails content knowledge and mastery of problem-solving processes. However, students sometimes lack metacognitive processes required for problem solving in chemistry. This study investigated how first-year chemistry students...
